title: Add HuggingFace provider to Provider enum and configuration
description:
**As a** Consoul developer
**I want** HuggingFace added as a supported provider in the configuration system
**So that** the foundation is in place for HuggingFace model integration

**Context:**
HuggingFace provides access to thousands of open-source models through their Hub API. LangChain supports HuggingFace via the langchain-huggingface package with two integration methods:
- HuggingFaceEndpoint: API-based access to hosted models (requires API token)
- HuggingFacePipeline: Local model execution via transformers library

This ticket lays the groundwork by adding HuggingFace to the Provider enum and updating configuration structures.

**Technical Notes:**
- src/consoul/config/models.py:49-56 - Add HUGGINGFACE to Provider enum
- src/consoul/ai/providers.py:31-36 - Add to PROVIDER_PACKAGES mapping
- src/consoul/ai/providers.py:38-44 - Add model name patterns for detection
- Package: langchain-huggingface
- API Token: HUGGINGFACEHUB_API_TOKEN environment variable

**Acceptance Criteria:**

Given I review the Provider enum
When I check src/consoul/config/models.py
Then HUGGINGFACE = "huggingface" is added to the enum

Given I check provider package mapping
When I review src/consoul/ai/providers.py  
Then Provider.HUGGINGFACE maps to "langchain_huggingface"

**Testing Considerations:**
- Add unit test for Provider enum member
- Test get_provider_from_model() with HuggingFace model names
- Verify mypy type checking passes

**Implementation Hints:**
Add HUGGINGFACE to Provider enum and update all provider mappings in providers.py

Files to modify:
- src/consoul/config/models.py
- src/consoul/ai/providers.py

comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content:
Implementation completed successfully.

Changes made:
- Added HUGGINGFACE = "huggingface" to Provider enum (src/consoul/config/models.py:56)
- Added Provider.HUGGINGFACE: "langchain_huggingface" to PROVIDER_PACKAGES mapping
- Added HuggingFace model patterns (meta-llama/, mistralai/, google/, openai-community/, microsoft/, facebook/) to PROVIDER_PATTERNS
- Ordered patterns correctly to prevent mistralai/ from matching Ollama's mistral pattern
- Added Provider.HUGGINGFACE: "HUGGINGFACEHUB_API_TOKEN" to API_KEY_ENV_VARS
- Added HuggingFace docs URL to PROVIDER_DOCS
- Added unit test for Provider.HUGGINGFACE enum value
- Added provider detection tests for HuggingFace model names

All tests passing. Ready for HuggingFace integration in subsequent tickets.
